name: The Yellow jacket man
description:
"...when I came back home I saw a lot of freakin bastards in my home. Is it a break in? Or are they looking for something specific? What ever they looking for I am going to kill them......"

The yellow jacket man is my entry for the Ludum Dare #32. The theme was Unconventional Weapon. This is just the starter edition basically.

More levels will be added over time. I hope you enjoy it.

=====CONTROLS============

Move: W key to move forward

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Look: Mouse

===========================
